testcase.classname: US_005_Login page should not be accessible with invalid credentials
testcase.name: TC_004_User with invalid credentials should be given an option to reset their password
testcase.system-out: When user goes to "GmiBank_HomePage"........................................passed Then user clicks Sign In dropdown menu......................................passed Then user clicks Sign In link...............................................passed Then user enters an "invalid_username" to username text box.................passed Then user enters a "invalid_password" to password text box..................passed Then user clicks Sign In button.............................................passed Then clicks sees New Account Register link..................................passed And user goes Registration Page "registiration_page"........................passed
